As a formerly undocumented New Yorker, I know the struggles that undocumented immigrants face -- and so does @ericadamsfornyc. From standing up to ICE to ensuring EVERYONE had access to support during COVID, Eric has fought alongside us, and he'll continue to do so as our Mayor.

@EricAdamsForNYC knows that any child who falls through the cracks in NYC is a child too many -- and he knows it because he was almost one of those kids. We need a Mayor who will take the fight for our kids‚Äô futures personally -- and that's why I'm on #TeamAdams

We‚Äôre being asked to choose between the justice we deserve and the safety we need. This is a false choice. If we elect @EricAdamsForNYC he will keep NYC safe and deliver the justice and reform we demand. #EricOn7
